== What is Inno JSON Parser ==

Inno JSON Parser is a simple DLL library, which can extend *[http://jrsoftware.org/ishelp/index.php?topic=unicode Unicode versions]* of a famous *[http://www.jrsoftware.org/isinfo.php/ Inno Setup]* installer<br>
of JSON parsing capabilities. It's written in Delphi 2009, based on very well known *[https://code.google.com/p/superobject/ SuperObject]* JSON parser.

== Features ==

  * it is possible to _embed_ the video player window into every *[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb773173%28v=vs.85%29.aspx window control]* in the setup wizard form
  * it supports to play audio and video files for which you have installed codecs (for list of built-in formats *[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd407173%28v=vs.85%29.aspx see here]*)

== Reference content ==

 * [Reference#DSGetLastError DSGetLastError] function - get information about the last error occurred
 * [Reference#DSInitializeAudioFile DSInitializeAudioFile] function - initialize media player for audio playback
 * [Reference#DSInitializeVideoFile DSInitializeVideoFile] function - initialize media player for video playback
 * [Reference#DSPlayMediaFile DSPlayMediaFile] function - play the initialized media file
 * [Reference#DSStopMediaPlay DSStopMediaPlay] function - stop the media stream playback and uninitialize DirectShow interfaces
 * [Reference#DSPauseMediaPlay DSPauseMediaPlay] function - pause the initialized media file playback
 * [Reference#DSSetVolume DSSetVolume] function - adjust media stream playback volume
 * [Reference#DSSetBalance DSSetBalance] function - adjust media stream audio signal balance

 * [Reference#TDirectShowEventProc TDirectShowEventProc] callback function - player state change callback
